description:
Easy to mount and adjust, these fenders provide protection from dirt, mud and water on your gravel, cyclocross or racing bike with disc brakes.

  • Once the mounts are on your bike, you can clip on and take off the fenders when not needed
  • Position is easily adjustable to get a perfect fit
  • Rear mudguard has telescoping extension
  • Both front and rear fenders included
  • Disc brake compatible
  • Length is 500mm and 210mm in the front, 950mm in the rear
name: SKS Speedrocker Gravel Fender Set
